2E1.1.title: Unlawful Conduct Relating to Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Is there an underlying racketeering activity with a determinable offense level?

After applying Chapter Three Parts A, B, C, and D to both the underlying racketeering activity offense level and base level 19, does the underlying racketeering activity result in a greater offense level than 19?

yesResult.description: Offense level applicable to the underlying racketeering activity (greater than 19)

noResult.description: Base level 19 (underlying racketeering activity does not exceed 19)

2E1.3.title: Violent Crimes in Aid of Racketeering Activity

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Is there an underlying crime of violence or other unlawful activity in respect to which the travel or transportation was undertaken?

noResult.description: Base level 6 when no underlying offense

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Is the offense level applicable to the underlying crime of violence or other unlawful activity (after applying Chapter Three adjustments) greater than 6?

yesResult.description: Use the offense level applicable to the underlying crime of violence or other unlawful activity

noResult.description: Base level 6 when underlying offense level is 6 or less

2E2.1.title: Making or Financing an Extortionate Extension of Credit; Collecting an

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What was the level of weapon involvement?

options.label: Dangerous weapon (including firearm) brandished or possessed
Dangerous weapon used to convey specific threat or make physical contact

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What was the degree of bodily injury to any victim?

options.label: Injury between bodily injury and serious bodily injury
Injury between serious bodily injury and permanent/life-threatening injury

specificOffenseCharacteristics.specialRule: Combined increase from weapon use and bodily injury shall not exceed 9 levels

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Was there any abduction or restraint of persons?

options.label: Person's freedom restricted through physical contact/confinement
Person abducted to facilitate offense or escape

2E4.1.title: Unlawful Conduct Relating to Contraband Cigarettes and Smokeless

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Is there a specific amount of tax evaded that can be determined?

noResult.description: Default base offense level when tax amount cannot be determined

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Using the Tax Table in §2T4.1, does the amount of tax evaded correspond to an offense level greater than 9?

yesResult.description: Offense level from §2T4.1 Tax Table corresponding to the amount of tax evaded (apply the greater of this level or 9)

noResult.description: Default base offense level of 9 applies when Tax Table level is 9 or lower

2E5.1.title: Offering, Accepting, or Soliciting a Bribe or Gratuity Affecting the Operation

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Does the offense involve a bribe (a payment made corruptly to influence an official act)?
Does the offense involve a gratuity (a payment for or because of an official act)?

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Was the defendant a fiduciary of the benefit plan or labor organization?
What was the value of the prohibited payment or improper benefit to the payer (whichever is greater)?

options.label: More than $2,500 but not more than $6,500
More than $6,500
options.description: Increase by the number of levels from the table in §2B1.1 corresponding to that amount

2E5.3.title: False Statements and Concealment of Facts in Relation to Documents

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Was the offense committed to facilitate or conceal another offense involving theft, fraud, embezzlement, bribe, gratuity, or obstruction of justice?
Was the underlying offense that was facilitated or concealed involving theft, fraud, or embezzlement?
Was the underlying offense that was facilitated or concealed involving a bribe or gratuity?

yesResult.description: Apply §2E5.1 (Offering, Accepting, or Soliciting a Bribe or Gratuity)

noResult.description: Apply applicable obstruction of justice offense guideline
